newsitem.title: USA: CCC Information sees larger market share.
newsitem.headline: CCC Information sees larger market share.

text.p: CCC Information Services Group Inc said Thursday that various new contracts with insurance carriers will result in first quarter 1997 charges for implementation but will boost the company's market share.

CCC said it recently signed three multi-year contracts for the use of CCC's workflow management software by field appraisers. Earlier in the year, the company signed a new contract and is continuing to work towards definitive terms with another insurance company.
"The company will incur implementation charges through the first quarter of 1997 as these new contracts are rolled-out," said David Phillips, chairman and chief executive officer.
"When implemented, these contracts will represent more than a 20 percent market share gain and a 60 percent increase in CCC's software licensing to field appraisers," Phillips said.
The company also said it will launch a new suite of productivity software tools to the collision repair industry in November.
Earlier, CCC reported earnings of $0.22 a share for the third quarter versus $0.04 a share last year.
